entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
